snippet: ROSEN--Walter. Dear friend, consummate family man, it was a privilege to really know him as a caring person and enjoyed our friendship My condolences to Sandy and the boys. The Breidbart Family 1/3
lead_paragraph: ROSEN--Walter. Dear friend, consummate family man, it was a privilege to really know him as a caring person and enjoyed our friendship My condolences to Sandy and the boys. The Breidbart Family 1/3
